Chalmers University of Technology: Chalmers University of Technology (Swedish: Chalmers tekniska h√∂gskola, commonly referred to as Chalmers) is a private research university located in Gothenburg, Sweden. Chalmers focuses on engineering and science, but more broadly it also conducts research and offers education in shipping, architecture and management.[2] The university has approximately 3100 employees and 10,000 students.
